settings.subtitle: PAGE NOT FOUND
settings.description: You may have mis-typed the URL. Or the page has been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable. Actually, there is nothing to see here....

settings.title: What does Shopify do?
settings.content: Shopify is a complete ecommerce solution that allows you to set up an online store to sell your goods. It lets you organize your products, customize your storefront, accept credit card payments, track and respond to orders — all with a few clicks of the mouse.

settings.title: How do I install Shopify?
settings.content: Shopify is web based ecommerce software. This means there’s no installation required and it works with all operating systems (including Windows and MacOS). Vendor host Shopify so you don’t have to worry about installing, upgrading or maintaining any software or web servers.

settings.title: Which languages are supported?
settings.content: The ecommerce storefront, checkout, email communications, etc, of a shop can be in any language. The administrative interface of a shop is in English.

settings.title: I cannot upload theme to my Shopify store. What is the problems?
settings.content:
Please make sure that you follow below steps:

1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find the file in the unzipped folder "themes": velatheme_{{version}}_package_v1.x.x.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.

settings.title: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.content:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to velatheme@gmail.com

settings.featured_text_section_text: Our aim is to provide the best fit with consistency across all sizes. If you are unhappy in any way with your EBYs, we will help you find your absolute best fit -- or your money back.

settings.title: Our Product
settings.richtext:
Ultra-soft, seamless underwear that fits your body to perfection.

We are women on a mission. Movers, shakers, and jugglers, who empower other amazing women with one simple decision —
Equal parts soft and stretch for the best fit of your life and that “am I even wearing undies?” feeling all day.

With a seamless fit, our panties will form
to your body to feel like a second skin, so that you look flawless.

This keeps your panties in place—no slipping down, no riding up, and absolutely
no bunching.
Perfect for everyday wear. Our moisture-wicking fabric is soft, stretchy and breathable. Designed to move with you and form perfectly to your curves.
So fresh and so clean. Our built-in cotton lining keeps your lady parts healthy.
An access to power from the women who wear the underwear to the women empowered by it to start their own businesses.

New collections of prints and colors released every month, so your underwear drawer
will never get boring.
All styles available in sizes XS - 4X because we want ALL the ladies in our crew. There’s power in numbers.

10% of proceeds for every panty sold goes
to empower a woman into business and
out of poverty.

settings.richtext_main:
What’s all the hype about?

Why are EBY Seamless Undies
better than all the rest?

settings.cat_tagline:
Our Undies Have Goals See Our
Impact in 2020

settings.heading: Microfinance
settings.count_content: Microfinance provides small loans to individuals who lack access to traditional financing services. EBY funds microfinance loans for women all around the world, enabling them to start their own businesses and break the cycle of poverty.

settings.heading: Why Microfinance?
settings.count_content:
Microfinance is the strongest poverty alleviation tool today. It starts with
a small loan, also known as a “first break.” These loans can amount to as little as $70 USD, but they make it possible for a woman without access to traditional banking or financial services to start or grow her own business.

With this loan, she becomes self-sufficient and breaks the cycle of poverty for herself and her children. Microfinance has a 97% repayment rate globally. When she pays back her loan, the same funds are then passed on to another woman in her community. The cycle continues, consistently building financial sustainability for women and their families, on repeat.

EBY consistently fuels this cycle, creating more first breaks, more independent women, and more thriving communities all over the world.

10% of proceeds from our underwear sales go to Seven Bar Foundation to empower women through microfinance: small loans that lead to incredible outcomes.

settings.heading: Why Underwear?
settings.count_content:
Panties are essential. You have to put them on everyday. It’s an easy and natural ritual that gets performed repeatedly and frequently. Panties are one of the most femine things you own.

Women’s empowerment is essential to every society and economy. It needs to be worked on everyday. It’s not currently an easy thing to achieve, but we’re getting closer. Authority over your life is one of the most powerful things you can own.

settings.richtext: Stay seamless on any budget. Pay 25% less for your box of seamless undies and unlock savings on all EBY products.
Enjoy full access to ALL products like bralettes, shapewear and matching sets at special member-only prices.

New undies every 3 or 6 months, delivered right to you with free shipping. Skip a month or cancel
any time.
Get weekly power tips on how to embody your fiercest self. When you join us, you join a conversation of badass ladies all over the world.
It’s so much more than a panty. Every panty sold funds a business loan for women around the world.

Be the first to access special
edition collections, exclusively
for our members.

settings.title: Also With Your Membership
settings.our_join: Ready to build the underwear drawer of your dreams?

settings.heading: Impact On Repeat
settings.count_content:
It starts with one (seamless panty). 10% of every purchase funds small loans for women around the world. She uses this loan to start her own business, lift up her community, and break the cycle of poverty for her children.
She pays back the loan, and it gets loaned to another woman in her town. That woman uses this loan to start her own business, lift up her community, and break the cycle of poverty for her children . . .
Your impact continues to grow and multiply over time. From one woman
to the next — on repeat. It never stops, and neither do we.

With every box of seamless undies you receive, 10% of proceeds funds small loans for women around the world to start their own businesses, and lift their families and communities out of poverty.

Learn more about our mission
settings.content:
Your choices have power / Put them on repeat

Join Now

settings.richtext: Let’s relate! Hear from real women discussing issues of confidence, life, loss, goals, getting older — and how they show up powerfully.
In depth interviews with influential people from various fields and walks of life sharing their views on how women can be confident and powerful.
Take a deep dive into these inspiring stories of triumph from EBY microloan recipients. These women turned breakdowns into breakthroughs, and changed their lives forever.
The best of our Power Series and a deep dive into our favorite blog topics. All on the theme of finding the confidence to persevere.

settings.title: The Confidence Project
settings.richtext_project:
Our promise is “the longer you are with us, the more powerful you become.” We asked our members which power they would most want — the answer across the board, “confidence.”

The Confidence Project provides access to a curated suite of stories & interviews from women of all walks of life, on the subject of Confidence. When you become a member, you join the conversation.
#accessyourpower

settings.work_text: Every time you buy our undies, we commit 10% of net proceeds to the Seven Bar Foundation 501 (c)(3).
The Seven Bar Foundation orks with vetted microfinance institutions to distribute small loans.
With that loan, these fearless women start or grow their own business, breaking the cycle of poverty for their children.
When the first loan is paid back, it is then loaned to another woman, creating a multiplier effect. As EBY gets more  subscriptions, we fund more microfinance options.

settings.title: Fit Guaranteed
settings.info: Our aim is to provide the best fit with consistency across all sizes. If you are unhappy in any way with your EBYs, we will help you find your absolute best fit -- or your money back.

settings.heading: Where Do EBY Funds Go?
settings.count_content:
Seven Bar Foundation is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization whose
mandate is to raise awareness and funds for microfinance programs focused on women globally. The Foundation finds, vets, and funds microfinance institutions to empower women out of poverty and into business.

To learn more, visit the Seven Bar Foundation website.

settings.step_title: The Best Undies You’ll Ever Wear
settings.richtext:
Soft and seamless. Feels like you’re wearing nothing. No-slip grip
allows our underwear to move with you, dance with you, make you feel
‘scream-from-the-rooftops’ incredible. On repeat.

10% of every panty sold goes to empowering women
out of poverty and into business.

settings.step_title: EBY is an Access to Power
settings.richtext: We are committed to empowering our members to step into their power. Get weekly Power Series emails and experience The Confidence Project alongside a strong community of super-star women. Ready to unleash your power?

We want you to be completely obsessed with your undies.
So wear ‘em, wash ‘em, and live in ‘em. If you don’t love them,
we’ll send you a full refund.

Our fit experts are here to help you find the best fit of your life.
With a 100% fit guarantee, we stand behind our product and
won’t stop until it’s right.

settings.heading:
See how our impact grows
year over year, on repeat
settings.impact_text_content:
Women & Children Impacted
by the End of 2021
settings.on_repeat_title:
And all you had to do
was put on a panty

settings.heading: What is EBY?
settings.acc_content:
You tell us your panty size, style, and color preferences (check, check, check), and then we curate a beautiful box of seamless undies based on your picks!

We’ll send you your EBY box Quarterly ($45/3 months), or Semi-Annually ($65/6 months) – whichever you choose. Never worry about running out of clean undies again!

settings.heading: What is your mission?
settings.acc_content:
We’re here to empower women, on repeat.

  1. Creating seamless intimates that fit your body perfectly and leave you feeling ready to take on the world, sans panty line. Stepping into your EBY’s = stepping into your power.
  2. Funding microfinance loans for women all over the world. Ten percent of every EBY purchase funds loans for women through the Seven Bar Foundation. These women start businesses, lift up their communities, and break the cycle of poverty. Watch Their Stories
  3. The relentless pursuit of empowerment. Members will receive weekly power tips on topics like confidence, getting sh*t done, and living the life of your dreams, and that’s just the beginning.

settings.heading: Where are EBY’s made?
settings.acc_content: EBYs are made in our factory in Sri Lanka, which upholds all UN Women’s Empowerment Principles and prides itself on a multifaceted Women Go Beyond Program. We have a personal relationship with our factory - after all, we make intimate apparel. Mutual respect and a commitment to collective wellbeing are sewn into every EBY garment.

settings.heading: What’s the material?
settings.acc_content: EBYs are 85% nylon and 15% spandex, with a cotton-lining to keep your lady parts healthy. Think equal parts soft and stretch, for a seamless fit that moves with you. Our performance based fabric is made for comfort first, and perfect for everyday wear.

settings.heading: What sizes do you carry?
settings.acc_content: EBYs come in sizes XS - 4X because we want ALL the ladies in our crew. We want you to be completely obsessed with your EBYs, so we also offer a 100% Fit Guarantee.

settings.heading: What’s so special about EBY?
settings.acc_content: EBYs are the best seamless undies you’ve ever worn. Our secret weapon is a no-slip grip. This innovative technology lines the inside of every panty, so it stays in place and moves with you. You can also expect a buttery-smooth feel, no VPL’s ever, and a collection of styles & designs to suit your every mood.

settings.heading: What underwear styles do you carry, and what’s the difference?
settings.acc_content:
Thong  With a flattering curve, this perfect piece contours  your body leaving absolutely no VPL’s.

Bikini Full coverage support with a high cut leg opening, to show off those fab legs of yours.

Brief  Full coverage and serious comfort with this ultra-smooth, modest rise brief. Sizes XS-XL.

Full Coverage Brief  Ultra-smooth, medium rise, and super-flattering. Hugs in all the right places with no pinch. Sizes 1X-4X.

High Waisted  The perfect high rise panty. Extra support to smooth out any unevenness and accentuate your curves for a flawless silhouette.

Cheeky  With a low-rise front and slim bum coverage, this style gives you just the right amount of sass.

settings.heading: You also have a seamless bralette? Tell me more!
settings.acc_content: Yes! The Bralette is completely seamless, supportive for everyday wear, ultra-soft, and crafted for comfort. Shop The Bralette

settings.heading: How do I care for my EBYs?
settings.acc_content: Treat them how we’d all like to be treated - with tenderness and care. Machine wash on delicate. Lay flat to dry.

settings.heading: You have a Fit Guarantee, what’s that?
settings.acc_content: We want you to be completely obsessed with your EBY undies. If anything doesn’t fit right or sit right, you can contact our team of bonafide Fit Experts, who will match you with exactly the right size and style for your body. We’ll send you a new size within a week.

settings.heading: Why should I switch to EBY?
settings.acc_content: Pull up a seat! There are so many stand-out reasons, we thought this Q deserved its own page. See why we stand out from the rest

settings.heading: Why does your website look different?
settings.acc_content: We did a little inner-work of our own, and we’re coming back as fierce as ever. Welcome to the refresh. What’s new? The look, the feel, the expanded membership options, the à la carte shopping, and more. What hasn’t changed? Our commitment to perfect, seamless undies, and our mission to empower women all over the world.

settings.heading: Do you sell gift cards?
settings.acc_content: We do not sell gift cards, but we hope to someday soon.
